abstract: General Electric agreed on Friday to buy the Italian aerospace company Avio for $4.3 billion, acquiring a long-time partner in its jet engine business.
snippet: General Electric agreed on Friday to buy the Italian aerospace company Avio for $4.3 billion, acquiring a long-time partner in its jet engine business.
lead_paragraph: LONDON – General Electric agreed on Friday to buy the Italian aerospace company Avio for $4.3 billion, acquiring a long-time partner in its jet engine business.

headline.main: General Electric to Buy Avio for $4.3 Billion
headline.print_headline: G.E. To Buy Italian Aerospace Company For $4.3. Billion
